page.title: 16A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY I.
page.content:
EVERY DAY I GET UP AT 6.30 AM, HAVE A WASH, THEN I GET DRESSED AND GO DOWN STAIRS TO HAVE BREAKFAST. FIRSTLY I PUT THE COFFEE POT ON, DRINK MY COFFEE AND THEN LEAVE AT 7.50 AM. I WAIT FOR THE BUS TO COME, WHICH GETS ME TO SCHOOL AT 8.45 AM.
SCHOOL BEGINS AT 9.00 AM, AND I HAVE THE FOLLOWING LESSONS. FIRST THERE IS A SCHOOL ASSEMBLY, THEN ART WITH MRS. GILBERT,AND ONE AFTER ONE HOUR I HAVE A BREAK WHICH STARTS AT 10.40 AM AND FINISHES AT 11.00 AM. THEN I HAVE MATHS WITH MISS GRIFFIN, THEN AFTER AN HOUR I HAVE STUDY SKILLS WITH MR. MACDONALD FOR THIRTY MINUTES.AT 12.30 PM WE HAVE LUNCH UNTIL 1.40 PM. NEXT I HAVE DRAMA WITH MR. LONGBONE FOR AN HOUR, AFTER WHICH I HAVE ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES WITH MR. TWEEDALE FOR HALF AN HOUR. {(CONTINUES ON NEXT PAGE)
